content: in a case heard by the harju county court the defendant has been ordered to pay procedural costs of 750 eur plus interest the case lasted for 4 months and the court made a final resolution the party representing the republic of estonia has obtained a default judgment in their favor the opposing party has the right to appeal this decision within 30 days if no appeal is filed the judgment will become final after five months the defendant can also file an appeal based on the inaction of the harju county court the claimant has brought an action against the defendant regarding the division of joint property after their marriage was dissolved they are seeking the division of a residential property and its sale proceeds the defendant has the opportunity to object to the claim within a set time limit if no response is received the court may issue a default judgment the court also orders the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the claimant has submitted a list of costs and the defendant can object to them however the court finds the claimants costs justified and orders the defendant to pay them the judge does not mention the names of the parties involved but refers to specific articles of the legal code throughout the text
